what does jamaican people speak? which Wikipedia URL has the answer? 

 Jamaican people speak Jamaican Creole, also known as Patois. The Wikipedia URL for this answer is https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jamaican_Creole 



 what did james k polk do before he was president? which Wikipedia URL has the answer? 

 Before becoming president, James K. Polk served as the Speaker of the House of Representatives (1835–1839), Governor of Tennessee (1839–1841), and U.S. Representative from Tennessee (1825–1839).

 The Wikipedia URL with the answer is: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_K._Polk#Early_life_and_career
